mapper.select: SELECT ANSWERU_SER AS AnswerSer, ANSWER_QN AS AnswerQn, ANSWER_OX AS AnsweROx, REGIST_ID AS RegistId, REGIST_DT AS RegistDt, UPDATE_ID AS UpdateId, UPDATE_DT AS UpdateDt FROM USER_ANSWER WHERE PK_ANSWER_SEQ = #{pkAnswerSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANSWER ( PK_ANSWER_SEQ, PK_QUSTION_SEQ, PK_USER_SEQ, ANSWER_USER, ANSWER_Qn, ANSWER_OX, REGIST_ID, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( ifnull(#{pkAnswerSeq}, null), #{answerUser}, #{answerQn} #{answerOx}, #{registId}, #{registDt}, #{updateId}, #{updateDt} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ANSWER_OX = IF( ANSWER_USER = ANSWER_QN, 'O', 'X' )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET USER_ANSWER WHERE UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, UPDATE_DT = #{updateDt}
